reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an amazing lecturer. His classes are engaging and he genuinely cares about his students.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis explains concepts well, but her exams can be tricky. Attend office hours!

reviews.subject: Ancient History
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the reading load is heavy. Be prepared to write long essays.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: The class is tough and Dr. Rodriguez moves quickly. Labs are especially challenging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Professor Kim encourages deep thinking and discussion.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and her passion for literature is contagious. Highly recommended.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: The material is difficult, and Dr. Brown's lectures are a bit dry. Study groups are a must.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: A very interesting course with a lot of discussion. Professor White is approachable and fair.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Green's lectures are very technical and he doesn't always explain concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Programming
reviews.review: Professor Taylor makes coding fun and accessible. Great for beginners!

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Interesting course material, though Dr. Anderson's lectures can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Professor Harris is passionate about art and it shows. Her classes are very enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is knowledgeable but his teaching style can be a bit confusing. Practice problems are essential.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: A great class for aspiring writers. Professor Martinez provides constructive feedback.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's exams are very difficult and the lectures can be hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Professor Moore is engaging and well-informed. Her classes are dynamic and interactive.

reviews.subject: Ethics
reviews.review: The course content is interesting, but Dr. Walker's grading is tough.

reviews.subject: American History
reviews.review: Professor Hall presents history in a captivating way. There's a lot of reading, but it's worth it.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: The material is challenging and Dr. Adams doesn't offer much help outside of lectures.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Professor Lewis brings real-world examples to class. The group projects are intense but rewarding.
